description: Factory AA for bonded stablecoins T1 arbitrage.

field_descriptions.max_reserve_share: Initial maximum share of the reserve currency (set 0.2 for 20%).
field_descriptions.min_reserve_share: Initial minimum share of the reserve currency (set 0.1 for 10%).
field_descriptions.triggerer_reward_share: Initial share of the reward paid to the user who triggered arbitrage (set 0.1 for 10%).
field_descriptions.min_reserve_delta: Initial minimum transaction amount in the reserve currency.
